name: Blood 4 Bit
description:
Hello everyone In my game, you will try to escape from a laboratory filled with zombies and traps. The game is made specifically for GBJAM 9. That is why it is decorated in this style. For development, I used the Game maker studio. I created sounds using rFXGen https://raylibtech.itch.io/rfxgen .

For the picture and music from the main menu, thank you to a very good girl Amaidonatsu!

Attention! The game is very difficult and the volume is turned on at 100%

Сontrol :

Start = space

A - action button

Use the arrows to move

The game has 3 levels. There are no saves
